prompt:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: demo-pod
spec:
  containers:
  - name: app
    image: nginx:latest
    securityContext:
      privileged: true

violations.msg: Container 'app' is running in privileged mode

prompt:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: safe-pod
spec:
  containers:
  - name: app
    image: nginx:1.21
    securityContext:
      runAsNonRoot: true
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
